Package heartbeat

Class HeartbeatManager

java.lang.Object
java.util.Observable
heartbeat.HeartbeatManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
IHeartBeatManager
public class HeartbeatManager
extends java.util.Observable
implements IHeartBeatManager
Implementation of IHeartBeatManager. Use Observable design pattern to notify the task manager and resource manager.
Author:
somilgupta

  • Constructor Details

      public HeartbeatManager​(IHeartBeatManager.Mode mode)

  • Method Details

    • handleMissingHeartbeat

      public void handleMissingHeartbeat​(int port)
      Description copied from interface: IHeartBeatManager
      Handler function for missing heartbeat. The function must notify resource manager to create new resource and task allocator to deallocate tasks for the failed node with the port number of that worker.
      Specified by:
      handleMissingHeartbeat in interface IHeartBeatManager
      Parameters:
      port - Port number of the worker that missed heartbeat.

    • addNewHeartBeat

      public void addNewHeartBeat​(int port)
      Description copied from interface: IHeartBeatManager
      Register new heartbeat a worker active at port given.
      Specified by:
      addNewHeartBeat in interface IHeartBeatManager
      Parameters:
      port - Port number of the new worker.

    • stopHeartBeat

      public void stopHeartBeat​(int port)
      Description copied from interface: IHeartBeatManager
      Explicitly kill the heartbeat for the given workerId. This is done when master wants to stop the worker preemptively.
      Specified by:
      stopHeartBeat in interface IHeartBeatManager
      Parameters:
      port - Port number of the worker to be killed.
